name: Universal Grow Controls
title: Programmer Internship
accomplishments: Programming logic controllers (PLCs) for multiple system types (environment control, beverage system monitoring, irrigation).
Developing web application to access a MySQL database and allow authorized users to view data and send queries.  Utilizes the ASP.NET Core framework and the MVC pattern.

name: Design Center Colorado
title: Systems Developer Contract
accomplishments: On interdisciplinary team of nine engineers, client was Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy who invested over $15,000 towards the project's completion.

Interfaced single board computer with three sensor modules (GPS, IMU, LIDAR) and an IR camera, installed/configured OS, developed program/service used to test sensors, buffer/log data, monitor system, and communicate with operator.
